comments.author: Dave
comments.body: No me today. I'm climbing Long's Peak this afternoon, then I'll be working on a cure for cancer in my basement lab later this evening. Need to save my energy, especially if I want to finish the day with a blues telejam with Clapton (he's been bugging me for a month to show him the B9th diminished chord again). Whew!

comments.author: iSean
comments.body: You're talkin' and talkin', but all I hear is "I like to whine. Pay attention to MEEEEE"

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Hey Sean... We can turn our attention to youuuu now. But wait; what's that dust-covered thing in the corner behind your desk? Oh, that's a bike? Hard to tell w/ all the cobwebs. Just a reminder: this is the _rider's_ blog. The kibitzer's blog is two blocks over, first right, then half a block down. Plenty of free parking.
